news.title: EU calls for 'respect' after Trump threatens 50% tariffs
news.summary: Trade chief Maros Sefcovic said the EU is "ready to defend" its interests after Trump threatened 50% tariffs on the bloc.

news.title: Mental health A&E centres to open across England
news.summary: The plans would allow people in acute mental distress to get treatment in hospital while also reducing A&E wait times.

news.title: Yachts an easy way to bring migrants to UK, says ex-smuggler
news.summary: Former British soldier describes smuggling dozens of Vietnamese into marinas in English seaside towns.

news.title: Kneecap defiant at first major gig since terror charge
news.summary: The Irish-language hip-hop trio play their biggest ever festival headline slot in south London.

news.title: Government delays publication of child poverty strategy
news.summary: The taskforce, which is working on the strategy, has been considering scrapping the two-child benefit cap.

news.title: Eighteen injured in Hamburg knife attack as woman arrested
news.summary: A 39-year-old woman is understood to have acted alone with no "political motive", German police say.

news.title: The Papers:  'Rayner on the Rampage' and 'My big sister Kate'
news.summary: Concerns over government cuts and a heart-warming interview with the Princess of Wales's brother lead the papers.

news.title: 'I don't know what we'll do' - Vapers panic-buy ahead of disposables ban
news.summary: Some disposable vape users say they are stockpiling, worried about what they will do after the ban.

news.title: Reform UK prepares for real power on a council it now dominates
news.summary: Lancashire's new councillors start their jobs, after the party's big wins in this month's local elections.

news.title: Boeing to avoid prosecution in US Justice Department deal over crashes
news.summary: The two crashes happened in 2018 and 2019 and left 346 people dead.
